option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --data_config_dir configs/dataset/supervised --output_file train-metrics-united-10ep.csv --logging_file train-loggings-united-10ep.out --output_name GNER-supervised --run_version FlanT5-Large-BL --pretrained google/flan-t5-large --num_train_epochs 10 --eval_epochs 0.5 --save_epochs 0.5 --learning_rate 5e-05 --logging_steps 5 --per_device_eval_batch_size 16 --per_device_train_batch_size 4 --gradient_accumulation_steps 8 --generation_max_length 640 --save_total_limit 2 --metric_for_best_model eval_average --no_use_flash_attention --no_debugging
